headline: Corebridge’s Accelerated Buybacks and Dividend Hike Could Be A Game Changer For Corebridge Financial (CRBG)
summary: Corebridge Financial, Inc. reported past fourth-quarter 2025 revenue of US$6,767 million and net income of US$814 million, while full-year 2025 revenue was US$18,481 million with a net loss of US$366 million, alongside a quarterly dividend of US$0.25 per share and completion of US$4.40 billion in share repurchases. These results came as Corebridge accelerated capital returns through a new share repurchase agreement with American International Group, aiming to reduce its share count while it...
